parameters.name: BodyType
parameters.description: Type of body as defined by swBodyType_e

parameters.name: VisibleOnly
parameters.description: True to get visible bodies only, false to get all bodies

title: IComponent2.EnumBodies3
description: Gets the bodies in the component in a multibody part.
signature:
EnumBodies2 EnumBodies3( 
   System.Int32
BodyType
,
   System.Boolean
VisibleOnly
)

parameters.name: BodyType
parameters.description: Type of body as defined by swBodyType_e

parameters.name: VisibleOnly
parameters.description: True to get visible bodies only, false to get all bodies

remarks: This method only supports solid and sheet (surface) types.
